methods.name: search
methods.description: Search the active directory for a certain type of object
methods.parameters: type: string, query: string, adServer: AD_Host

methods.name: searchExactMatch
methods.description: Search the active directory for a certain type of object. Object will be returned only if the there is exact match.
methods.parameters: type: string, objectName: string, limit: number, adServer: AD_Host

methods.name: getComputerAD
methods.description: Returns a computer when his exact name is given. If no computer found, returns null

methods.name: getDC
methods.description: Return the AD_Computer representing the Domain Conroller

methods.name: getEntry
methods.description: Retrieves the entry with the specified DN.
methods.parameters: baseDN: string, attributes: Array/string, host: AD_Host

methods.name: rename
methods.description: Allows a client to change the leftmost (least significant) component of the name of an entry in the directory, or to move a subtree of entries to a new location in the directory. For example, to rename "cn=SomeUser, ou=People, dc=demo, dc=org" to "cn=AnotherUser, ou=People, dc=demo, dc=org" you must provide from as "cn=SomeUser, ou=People, dc=demo, dc=org" and to as "cn=AnotherUser". To move the entry under different tree node new_parent "cn=NewName, ou=NewParent, dc=demo, dc=org" must be provided.
methods.parameters: from: string, to: string, new_parent: string, param3: AD_Host

methods.name: searchForEntry
methods.description: Processes a search operation with the provided information. It is expected that at most one entry will be returned from the search, and that no additional content from the successful search result (e.g., diagnostic message or response controls) are needed.
methods.parameters: baseDN: string, searchScope: LdapSearchScope, timeLimit: number, filter: string, attributes: Array/string, host: AD_Host

methods.name: searchRecursively
methods.description: Search recursively the whole domain tree of Active Directory for a certain type of objects.
methods.parameters: type: string, query: string, adServer: AD_Host

methods.name: getComputerADRecursively
methods.description: Gets computers recursively for the whole domain tree

methods.name: getAllDomainControllerComputers
methods.description: Retrieves all AD_Computer instances for the domain and all sub-domain Domain Controllers.

methods.name: removeAttribute
methods.description: Removes an attribute as specified by the attribName parameter

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Destroy this element from the AD. Take care, this action PERMANENTLY DESTROY the element

methods.name: rename
methods.description: Allows a client to change the leftmost (least significant) component of the name of an entry in the directory. Тo rename the entry you must provide it with the attribute as prefix - e.g. "cn=newName".

methods.name: LdapClient
methods.description: Creates a new LDAP connection that is established to the specified server and is authenticated as the specified user (via LDAP simple authentication).
methods.parameters: param0: Object, param1: string, param2: number, param3: string, param4: string

methods.name: isConnected
methods.description: Indicates whether this connection is currently established.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the entry with the specified DN.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes an unauthenticated connection to the directory server using the provided information.
methods.parameters: host: string, port: number, timeout: number

methods.name: close
methods.description: If this method is invoked while any operations are in progress on this connection, then the directory server may or may not abort processing for those operations, depending on the type of operation and how far along the server has already gotten while processing that operation. It is recommended that all active operations be abandoned, canceled, or allowed to complete before attempting to close an active connection.

methods.name: addEntry
methods.description: Processes an add operation with the provided information.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Processes a search operation with the provided information. The search result entries and references will be collected internally and included in the SearchResult object that is returned.
methods.parameters: baseDN: string, searchScope: LdapSearchScope, derefPolicy: LdapDereferencePolicy, sizeLimit: number, timeLimit: number, filter: string, attributes: Array/string

methods.name: bind
methods.description: The LDAP protocol specification forbids clients from attempting to perform a bind on a connection in which one or more other operations are already in progress. If a bind is attempted while any operations are in progress, then the directory server may or may not abort processing for those operations.

methods.name: getEntry
methods.description: Retrieves the entry with the specified DN. The requested entry, or null if the target entry does not exist or no entry was returned (e.g., if the authenticated user does not have permission to read the target entry).

methods.name: addAttribute
methods.description: Processes an add operation with the provided information.

methods.name: setConnectionName
methods.description: Specifies the user-friendly name that should be used for this connection. This name may be used in debugging to help identify the purpose of this connection.

methods.name: modify
methods.description: Applies the provided modification to the specified entry.

methods.name: reconnect
methods.description: Attempts to re-establish a connection to the server and re-authenticate if appropriate.

methods.name: getConnectionName
methods.description: Retrieves the user-friendly name that has been assigned to this connection.

methods.name: getDisconnectMessage
methods.description: Retrieves the disconnect message for this connection, which may provide additional information about the reason for the disconnect, if available.

methods.name: getLastCommunicationTime
methods.description: Retrieves the time that this connection was last used to send or receive an LDAP message. The value will represent the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970 UTC (the same format used by System.currentTimeMillis.

methods.name: deleteByDeleteRequest
methods.description: Deletes the entry with the specified DN.

methods.name: searchBySearchRequest
methods.description: Processes a search operation with the provided information. The search result entries and references will be collected internally and included in the SearchResult object that is returned.

methods.name: modifyDN
methods.description: Applies the provided modification to the specified entry.
methods.parameters: dn: string, newRDN: string, deleteOldRDN: boolean, newSuperiorDN: string

methods.name: getConnectTime
methods.description: Retrieves the time that this connection was established in the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970 UTC (the same format used by System.currentTimeMillis.

methods.name: searchForEntry
methods.description: Processes a search operation with the provided information. It is expected that at most one entry will be returned from the search, and that no additional content from the successful search result (e.g., diagnostic message or response controls) are needed.
methods.parameters: dn: string, searchScope: LdapSearchScope, timeLimit: number, filter: string, attributes: Array/string

classes.name: LdapDeleteRequest
classes.description: This class implements the processing necessary to perform an LDAPv3 search operation, which can be used to retrieve entries that match a given set of criteria.

methods.name: duplicate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of this LDAP request that may be modified without impacting this request. The provided controls will be used for the new request instead of duplicating the controls from this request.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: (Static) Factory method for creating new LdapDeleteRequest instances from provided info.

methods.name: getDN
methods.description: Retrieves the DN of the entry to delete.

methods.name: setDN
methods.description: Specifies the DN of the entry to delete.

methods.name: getControl
methods.description: Retrieves the control with the specified OID from this request. If this request has multiple controls with the specified OID, then the first will be returned.

methods.name: getOperationType
methods.description: Retrieves the type of operation that is represented by this request.

methods.name: getControls
methods.description: Retrieves the set of controls for this request. The caller must not alter this set of controls.

methods.name: hasControl
methods.description: Indicates whether this request contains at least one control.

methods.name: getResponseTimeoutMillis
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum length of time in milliseconds that processing on this operation should be allowed to block while waiting for a response from the server.

methods.name: setResponseTimeoutMillis
methods.description: Specifies the maximum length of time in milliseconds that processing on this operation should be allowed to block while waiting for a response from the server. A value of zero indicates that no timeout should be enforced. A value that is less than zero indicates that the default response timeout for the underlying connection should be used.

methods.name: getLastMessageID
methods.description: Retrieves the message ID for the last LDAP message sent using this request.

methods.name: setFollowReferrals
methods.description: Specifies whether to automatically follow any referrals encountered while processing this request. This may be used to override the default behavior defined in the connection options for the connection used to process the request.

methods.name: followReferrals
methods.description: Indicates whether to automatically follow any referrals encountered while processing this request. If a value has been set for this request, then it will be returned. Otherwise, the default from the connection options for the provided connection will be used.

methods.name: replaceControl
methods.description: Replaces the control with the same OID as the provided control with the provided control. If no control with the same OID exists in the request, then the control will be added to the request. If the request has multiple controls with the same OID as the new control, then only the first will be replaced.

methods.name: clearControls
methods.description: Removes all controls from this request.

methods.name: addControl
methods.description: Adds the provided control to the set of controls for this request.

methods.name: replaceControlByOid
methods.description: Replaces the control with the specified OID with the provided control. If no control with the given OID exists in the request, then a new control will be added. If this request has multiple controls with the specified OID, then only the first will be replaced.

methods.name: hasControlByOid
methods.description: Indicates whether this request contains at least one control with the specified OID.

methods.name: removeControlByOid
methods.description: Removes the control with the specified OID from the set of controls for this request. If this request has multiple controls with the same OID, then only the first will be removed.

classes.name: LdapEntry
classes.description: This class provides a data structure for holding information about an LDAP entry. An entry contains a distinguished name (DN) and a set of attributes. An entry can be created from these components, and it can also be created from its LDIF representation as described in RFC 2849.

methods.name: LdapEntry
methods.description: Creates a new entry with the provided DN and set of attributes.

methods.name: LdapEntry
methods.description: Creates a new entry from the provided LDIF representation.

methods.name: removeAttribute
methods.description: Removes the specified attribute from this entry.

methods.name: hasAttribute
methods.description: Indicates whether this entry contains the specified attribute.

methods.name: getAttributes
methods.description: Retrieves the set of attributes contained in this entry

methods.name: getAttribute
methods.description: Retrieves the attribute with the specified name.

methods.name: addAttribute
methods.description: Adds the specified attribute to this entry, if it is not already present.

methods.name: getAttributeValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value for the specified attribute, if available. If the attribute has more than one value, then the first value will be returned.

methods.name: removeAttributeValue
methods.description: Removes the specified attribute value from this entry if it is present. If it is the last value for the attribute, then the entire attribute will be removed. If the specified value is not present, then no change will be made.

methods.name: getAttributeValues
methods.description: Retrieves the set of values for the specified attribute, if available

methods.name: getDN
methods.description: Retrieves the DN for this entry.

methods.name: hasAttributeWithName
methods.description: Indicates whether this entry contains the specified attribute.

methods.name: hasAttributeValueBytes
methods.description: Indicates whether this entry contains an attribute with the given name and value.

methods.name: getAttributeValueAsBytes
methods.description: Retrieves the value for the specified attribute, if available. If the attribute has more than one value, then the first value will be returned.

methods.name: addAttributeValue
methods.description: Adds the specified attribute value to this entry, if it is not already present.

methods.name: addAttributeValueAsByte
methods.description: Adds the specified attribute value to this entry, if it is not already present.

methods.name: addAttributeValues
methods.description: Adds the provided attribute to this entry. If this entry already contains an attribute with the same name, then their values will be merged.

methods.name: removeAttributeValueAsBytes
methods.description: Removes the specified attribute value from this entry if it is present. If it is the last value for the attribute, then the entire attribute will be removed. If the specified value is not present, then no change will be made.

methods.name: setAttributeValue
methods.description: Adds the provided attribute to this entry, replacing any existing set of values for the associated attribute.

methods.name: setAttributeValueAsBytes
methods.description: Adds the provided attribute to this entry, replacing any existing set of values for the associated attribute.

methods.name: setAttributeValues
methods.description: Adds the provided attribute to this entry, replacing any existing set of values for the associated attribute.

methods.name: setDN
methods.description: Specifies the DN for this entry.

methods.name: getParsedDN
methods.description: Retrieves the parsed DN for this entry.

methods.name: getParentDNString
methods.description: Retrieves the parent DN for this entry as a string.

methods.name: hasAttributeValue
methods.description: Indicates whether this entry contains an attribute with the given name and value.

methods.name: hasObjectClass
methods.description: Indicates whether this entry contains the specified object class.

methods.name: getAttributeValueAsBoolean
methods.description: Retrieves the value for the specified attribute, if available. If the attribute has more than one value, then the first value will be returned.

methods.name: getAttributeValueAsDate
methods.description: Retrieves the value for the specified attribute, if available. If the attribute has more than one value, then the first value will be returned.

methods.name: getAttributeValueAsInteger
methods.description: Retrieves the value for the specified attribute, if available. If the attribute has more than one value, then the first value will be returned.

methods.name: getAttributeValueAsLong
methods.description: Retrieves the value for the specified attribute, if available. If the attribute has more than one value, then the first value will be returned.

methods.name: getAttributeValueByteArrays
methods.description: Retrieves the set of values for the specified attribute, if available

methods.name: getObjectClassValues
methods.description: Retrieves the values of the "objectClass" attribute from the entry, if available.

methods.name: toLDIF
methods.description: Retrieves an LDIF representation of this entry, with each attribute value on a separate line. Long lines will not be wrapped.

methods.name: toLDIFString
methods.description: Retrieves an LDIF-formatted string representation of this entry. No wrapping will be performed, and no extra blank lines will be added.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns load balancing mode as string.

methods.name: getValuesAsString
methods.description: (Static) Returns supported load balancing modes .

methods.name: fromString
methods.description: (Static) Create LdapLoadBalancingMode object from it's string representation.

attributes.name: RoundRobin
attributes.description: Use a round-robin algorithm to select the server to which the connection should be established. Any number of servers may be included in this server set, and each request will attempt to retrieve a connection to the next server in the list.

attributes.name: Failover
attributes.description: Establish connections to servers in the order they are provided. If the first server is unavailable, then it will attempt to connect to the second, then to the third.

classes.name: LdapSearchRequest
classes.description: This class implements the processing necessary to perform an LDAPv3 search operation, which can be used to retrieve entries that match a given set of criteria.

methods.name: duplicate
methods.description: Creates a new instance of this LDAP request that may be modified without impacting this request. The provided controls will be used for the new request instead of duplicating the controls from this request.

methods.name: setFilter
methods.description: Specifies the filter that should be used to identify matching entries.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: (Static) Factory method for creating new LdapSearchRequest instances from provided info.
methods.parameters: param0: string, param1: string, param2: LdapSearchScope, param3: Array/string, param4: LdapDereferencePolicy, param5: number, param6: number, param7: boolean

methods.name: setScope
methods.description: Specifies the scope for this search request.

methods.name: typesOnly
methods.description: Indicates whether the server should return only attribute names in matching entries, rather than both names and values.

methods.name: getSizeLimit
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of entries that should be returned by the server when processing this search request.

methods.name: getBaseDN
methods.description: Retrieves the base DN for this search request

methods.name: getTimeLimitSeconds
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum length of time in seconds that the server should spend processing this search request.

methods.name: setBaseDN
methods.description: Specifies the base DN for this search request.

methods.name: setSizeLimit
methods.description: Specifies the maximum number of entries that should be returned by the server when processing this search request. A value of zero indicates that there should be no limit.

methods.name: setDerefPolicy
methods.description: Specifies the dereference policy that should be used by the server for any aliases encountered during search processing.

methods.name: setTypesOnly
methods.description: Specifies whether the server should return only attribute names in matching entries, rather than both names and values.

methods.name: getAttributeList
methods.description: Retrieves the set of requested attributes to include in matching entries.

methods.name: setTimeLimitSeconds
methods.description: Specifies the maximum length of time in seconds that the server should spend processing this search request. A value of zero indicates that there should be no limit.

methods.name: setAttributes
methods.description: Specifies the set of requested attributes to include in matching entries.

methods.name: getScope
methods.description: Retrieves the scope for this search request.

methods.name: getControl
methods.description: Retrieves the control with the specified OID from this request. If this request has multiple controls with the specified OID, then the first will be returned.

methods.name: getOperationType
methods.description: Retrieves the type of operation that is represented by this request.

methods.name: getControls
methods.description: Retrieves the set of controls for this request. The caller must not alter this set of controls.

methods.name: hasControl
methods.description: Indicates whether this request contains at least one control.

methods.name: getResponseTimeoutMillis
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum length of time in milliseconds that processing on this operation should be allowed to block while waiting for a response from the server.

methods.name: setResponseTimeoutMillis
methods.description: Specifies the maximum length of time in milliseconds that processing on this operation should be allowed to block while waiting for a response from the server. A value of zero indicates that no timeout should be enforced. A value that is less than zero indicates that the default response timeout for the underlying connection should be used.

methods.name: getLastMessageID
methods.description: Retrieves the message ID for the last LDAP message sent using this request.

methods.name: setFollowReferrals
methods.description: Specifies whether to automatically follow any referrals encountered while processing this request. This may be used to override the default behavior defined in the connection options for the connection used to process the request.

methods.name: followReferrals
methods.description: Indicates whether to automatically follow any referrals encountered while processing this request. If a value has been set for this request, then it will be returned. Otherwise, the default from the connection options for the provided connection will be used.

methods.name: replaceControl
methods.description: Replaces the control with the same OID as the provided control with the provided control. If no control with the same OID exists in the request, then the control will be added to the request. If the request has multiple controls with the same OID as the new control, then only the first will be replaced.

methods.name: clearControls
methods.description: Removes all controls from this request.

methods.name: addControl
methods.description: Adds the provided control to the set of controls for this request.

methods.name: replaceControlByOid
methods.description: Replaces the control with the specified OID with the provided control. If no control with the given OID exists in the request, then a new control will be added. If this request has multiple controls with the specified OID, then only the first will be replaced.

methods.name: hasControlByOid
methods.description: Indicates whether this request contains at least one control with the specified OID.

methods.name: removeControlByOid
methods.description: Removes the control with the specified OID from the set of controls for this request. If this request has multiple controls with the same OID, then only the first will be removed.
